original_title: KISS Frontmen: Gene Simmons and Paul Stanley
overview: KISS - A band is almost always defined by its frontman and normally there is only one of them â€“ ego, talent & chemistry demand it. But KISS is different. They have two frontmen: Gene Simmons and Paul Stanley who somehow shared the limelight, and gave us a spectacle like no other - fire bombs, smoking guitars and spitting blood were all part of the act.
title: KISS Frontmen: Gene Simmons and Paul Stanley
